features: Beautiful Nursery Shelves: The ZICOTO floating book shelves for wall are the perfect addition to your nursery furniture! The white & natural brown wood kids bookshelf set is a decorative gem in any nursery, kids room & bedroom

Super Versatile Furniture - Great For Books, Toys & More: Enjoy endless possibilities with the wall bookshelf set for kids! Use it as nursery bookshelf, for photos, small toys, but also for diapers, baby powder, toiletry essentials & more

Set Of 3 Perfect Sized Shelves: The book shelf for the kids room provides ample space Very Sturdy and Save: Thanks to its robust construction in solid wood, when mounted properly, you can place books or other heavier favorites on the nursery book shelves - without worrying about the toddler wall shelves falling downhe size of 16.5x4.5x4.5” per shelf and comes in a set of 3, so you can mount it for various uses.

Very Sturdy and Save: Thanks to its robust construction in solid wood, when mounted properly, you can place books or other heavier favorites on the nursery book shelves - without worrying about the toddler wall shelves falling down

Easy Mounting – Assembly Instructions Included: Mounting each baby bookshelf is extremely easy through 2 keyhole mounts; the bookshelf set for kids bedroom arrives along with hardware & an installation guide
body.description: Set Of 3 Wall Kids Bookshelf By ZICOTO! When putting the finishing touches on the baby room decor, you shouldn’t miss out on those functional, yet beautiful modern bookshelf for kids. Make the most out of your space and use these floating book shelves for wall installation for a variety of items in your nursery or even your bathroom. Store anything from books, toys, stuffed animals, photos, diapers, to baby powder and toiletry essentials such as body lotions, toilet paper – the baby bookshelf set offers ample shelf space in the bedroom. Mounted easy as pie & reliable stability: follow the simple step-by-step installation guide to mount the nursery wall shelves with the included hardware in no time. Thanks to its sturdy construction each book shelf for the kids room can easily hold your items securely, when mounted correctly. A lovely nursery decor and furniture for girls and boys alike!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They make my daughters room look really cute with all her little books on the wall. Small, durable, easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: These are simple shelves for the thrifty shopper. Looks great in a nursery or bedroom. Assembly was very easy, I didn’t even open the instructions and they look great on my son’s bedroom wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy this. It’s terrible quality and very bad workmanship. Breaks easily and does not align properly. Complete waste of money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: These shelves work great in my baby’s room. Use it to hold books. Was very simple to put the shelves together and to hang on the wall. They are sturdy and do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Front part of shelf broke
reviews.reviewText: For the price- not awful, very cute. The wooden front part broke during install. Had to glue it back, which ended up being fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t build well
reviews.reviewText: Cute product but the holes didn’t line up with wood products and had to end up drilling our own holes in order for it to be properly constructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect but Be Delicate!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my nursery. They are so cute once they’re up, the screws and little leveler it comes with were extremely useful. Ideal size for a few teddy bears or even books. I gave it 4 stars because we started off with one shelf and as soon as we went to attach it to the wall, it chipped on the side as soon on the picture. Very noticeable depending on where you’re putting the shelf. We were even more careful with the second one and it did the same thing. The green dinosaurs arm is covering it.Overall tho, would buy again!
